name: 1 Minute Jumper
description:
This is 1 Minute Jumper,  a game in which you have one minute to climb as high as you can.  You play as the little character with a pogo stick 

How to Play
A - D Move
Jumping is automatic

Note
This game was made under 3 hours for the Trijam Game Jam

Credits
0xAaaron 

Have Fun :)
